mapper.sql: ecbup_id , ec_company_id, start_type, sort_id, platform_id, pc_name, pc_percent, description
mapper.insert: insert into ecbu_pcompany (ecbup_id, ec_company_id, start_type, sort_id, platform_id, pc_name, pc_percent, description) values (#{ecbupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcPercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update ecbu_pcompany
ec_company_id = #{ecCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_type = #{startType,jdbcType=BIT},
sort_id = #{sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pc_name = #{pcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pc_percent = #{pcPercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and ecbup_id = #{ecbupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from ecbu_pcompany
AND ec_company_id = #{ecCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by sort_id desc limit 1
